alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 02 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of South Florida, including the following counties, Glades, Hendry and Palm Beach. * WHEN...Until 530 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated the thunderstorms have moved out of the area. However, rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches have fallen from the thunderstorms. This amount of water will take some time to drain away. Therefore, the Flood Advisory will remain in affect until 530 PM EDT this evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clewiston, Moore Haven, Harlem and Lake Hicpochee. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
